nodes.excerpt: appfleet is an edge compute platform that allows people to deploy their web applications globally. Instead of running your code in a single centralized location you can now run it everywhere, at the same time. Get better performance, latency and uptime!

nodes.excerpt: Scale database resources in and out on demand to match application requirements and traffic so that you pay only for what you use. Runs on every cloud with developer GraphQL, REST, JSON, CQL APIs. $25 usage credits per month.

nodes.title: Screen - Screenshot creator for product pages on app stores

nodes.excerpt: Keka wants to be an easy to use little app, well integrated in macOS and very powerful. And it is. You can compress files in all common (and not that common) formats and uncompress almost every format file, with and without encryption.
nodes.title: Keka - The macOS file archiver

nodes.excerpt: A text editor where you can type dialogues, add emotions (crying, shouting, hatred, polite, out of breath, etc.). Select from a set of voices (hero, villain, AI, merchant, kid, etc.), add background effects, and export as a human-like voice in studio quality.

nodes.excerpt: Creating a nice looking SVG Color Matrix filter is tricky. This free web-app helps you easily create the right color matrix for your picture. Add contrast, brightness, hue, and saturation filters or adjust one or multiple matrix values simultaneously.
